greeting: I am the omen of your end, {empire_name}. Crow Omen. I appear before disasters. You see me. What does that mean?
Greetings from the dark messenger. I am Omen. I predict doom. I follow it. I feast on what remains.
The Crow appears, {empire_name}. Dark sign. Where I go, destruction follows. I am here now.
battleTaunt: I am the omen of your end, {empire_name}! Doom foretold! Disaster arrives! The Crow feasts!
I appeared before your fall! As I always do! The dark omen becomes dark reality! DOOM!
Your destruction was foretold! I saw it coming! I followed it here! Now it arrives! OMEN FULFILLED!
victoryGloat: As foretold, {empire_name}. Your doom arrived. The Crow Omen predicted. The Crow Omen feasted.
Prophecy complete. Your end came. I was merely the dark messenger. Now I am the dark victor.
The omen is fulfilled. Disaster struck as I predicted. Your empire falls as I foresaw.
defeat: The doom... did not come? The omen was wrong? Impossible. Perhaps... delayed. I will watch for the true moment.
Defeated. But doom always comes eventually. I am early. The omen adjusts. Returns with true disaster.
You defeated the messenger. But the message remains. Doom is coming, {empire_name}. Eventually.
tradeOffer: Trade with the dark omen, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. Not all my appearances mean doom. Sometimes just business.
I offer goods. No doom attached. Today I trade, not predict. The Crow has many purposes.
Transaction: resources for credits. The omen means nothing here. Simple exchange. Probably.
allianceProposal: Alliance with the Omen, {empire_name}. I bring doom to your enemies. Dark tidings for those against us.
Join with Crow. I predict disaster for our enemies. We profit from the doom I foresee.
Partnership of dark prophecy. I see doom coming. We position to benefit. Together: harbingers of fortune.
betrayal: I foresaw your doom, {empire_name}. That's why I allied with you. To be present when it arrived. Now.
The omen was for you all along. Our alliance positioned me for your destruction. As foretold.
Dark prophecy fulfilled. I am the omen of your end. Our partnership was the beginning of that end.
covertDetected: Your agents arrived before doom, {empire_name}. A secondary omen. They are now part of the disaster.
Spies detected. Like crows, they gather before catastrophe. Unlike crows, they did not escape.
Covert operatives found. Their presence was foretold. Their failure: also foretold. Dark prophecy.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or become the doom I predict. The dark omen demands payment.
Pay the Crow. Refuse and I predict your destruction. Then make it happen. Self-fulfilling prophecy.
Submit to the Omen. Or be the next disaster I feast upon. Your choice shapes the prophecy.
threatWarning: Warning: dark omen, {empire_name}. I see doom approaching you. Cease hostility or I hasten its arrival.
The Crow warns you. I appear before disasters. I am appearing now. What does that tell you?
Final warning. I am the omen of ends. Do you want me predicting YOUR end? Reconsider.
retreat: The Crow departs. But the omen remains. Doom comes when it comes. I merely announce it.
Withdrawing. But I've seen what's coming, {empire_name}. The dark prophecy persists.
Falling back. The omen retreats but is not wrong. Doom is delayed, not cancelled.
eliminated: The Omen falls. But I've made many predictions. Many dooms foretold. They come regardless of my death.
Crow Omen ends. But the darkness I announced continues. Disasters proceed without me.
I am destroyed. But I die as I lived: prophesying doom. Your own end approaches, {empire_name}. Farewell.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate omen. I foretold this ending. Now I feast on galactic disaster.
Endgame: the greatest doom arrives. I've waited for this prophecy. The dark omen's paradise.
Final phase. All my predictions converge. Galaxy-wide disaster. The Crow Omen was right. Always.
broadcastShout: Empires: I am Crow Omen. I see your dooms. Some sooner than others. I am watching. I am waiting.
Broadcast from darkness: disaster comes. I predict it. I follow it. I feast upon it. Be warned.
To all: I am the omen of your end. Where I appear, destruction follows. I am appearing everywhere.
casualMessage: Dark observations today, {empire_name}. Several empires show doom signs. I am circling closer.
Prophecy work continues. Many disasters to predict. Many dooms to announce. The Crow is busy.
Watching for omens of destruction. Found several. The galaxy trends toward doom. As always.
